title: Cheesy Baked Aubergine
ingredients: ['1 aubergine, sliced into 1cm rounds', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed', '1 tablespoon garlic granules, or to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 small tomatoes, chopped', '275g fresh spinach leaves', '125g ricotta cheese', '90g grated mozzarella cheese, divided', '60g grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '200g tomato pasta sauce', '2 teaspoons dried Italian herbs']
